alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 8:40AM MST until December 28 at 1:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Southern Campbell County and the Weston County Plains. * WHEN...Until 1 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.
